title: Moneyview | SDE1 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech in CSE (Tier - 3 College) 2022 passout
Years of Experience: Fresher
Prior Experience: None
Company: Moneyview
Title/Level: Software engineer - 1
Location: Bangalore
Salary: INR 13,00,000
Signing Bonus: INR 100,000 first month.
Performance Bonus: INR 50,000 per 6 months and can go upto 150% of this based on your performance.
ESOPS: INR 700000 vested over 4 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): ~ INR 16,00,000 first year
Benefits: Standard
